oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Col. Peck to his sister Jane following the Battle of Winchester, Va.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Jefferson County man, Col. William R. Peck, fighting with a Louisiana cavalry regiment in Lee's Army of Northern Virginia, writes of the preceding days' action following battle in the Shenandoah Valley with Gen. Philip Sheridan's army.
